mapper.select: SELECT rnum, rno, btitle, rcontent, memail, bno, rdate FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, rno, btitle, rcontent, memail, bno, rdate FROM (SELECT rno, btitle, rcontent, r.memail, r.bno, rdate FROM board b, reply r WHERE r.bno = b.bno ORDER BY rdate DESC) WHERE rownum <=#{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(rno, rcontent, firstcomment, memail, bno, rdate) valuse(seq_reply_rno.nextval, #{rcontent}, #{rno}, #{meamil}, #{bno}, sysdate )
